actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend section 9311 of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986 to delay for 1 year implementation of the restrictions on use of the periodic interim payment system under medicare.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986 to delay for one year implementation of the periodic interim payment system for inpatient services provided by hospitals under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 9311 of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986 to delay for 1 year implementation of the restrictions on use of the periodic interim payment system under medicare.
